text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
Fuji Kiseki's popularity continues to rise<n>with no
end in sight. The younger<n>student who's been
following her races<n>comes to speak with her.

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
She explains how it's thanks to Fuji<n>Kiseki that she
was able to realize<n>something important about
herself, but<n>Fuji Kiseki seems conflicted by this<n>
confession...

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
Fuji Kiseki realizes it's not only this one<n>younger
student feeling limited by her<n>distance aptitude,
and she sets a new<n>goal for herself.

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
She declares that she'll take on and<n>conquer four
G1 races of varying<n>distances!

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
I throw my full support behind her.<n>When she
makes the grand<n>announcement about her plans,
the<n>world is thrown into a frenzy!
